name: Fractured Time
description:
You are stuck in a time loop.  You must go through different time periods and collect Time Fragments to break the loop.

This is just a prototype.  There is something that is happening with the graphics in the build that isn't happening in the editor.  I will fix it in a future build, hopefully.

Use arrow keys to move, space to jump, and w to enter the door.

All aspects of this game were created by Billy Newcomb.
